content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":122311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「僕がなんとか、君を守るから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll do whatever I can to protect you...\""},{"lineNumber":122312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だから、そんな顔をしないで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, please don't make such a face...\""},{"lineNumber":122313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":122314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ルストン家の嫡子として、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As the heir of the Ruston family,"},{"lineNumber":122315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一度口にした言葉は違えない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I never go back on my word once spoken.\""},{"lineNumber":122316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの時、言った言葉は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The words I said back then,"},{"lineNumber":122317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今も残ってると思ってるから」","translatedEnglishLine":"I still believe they hold true even now.\""},{"lineNumber":122318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":122319,"originalJapaneseLine":"イアンの言葉をじっくりと咀嚼するように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if carefully digesting Ian's words,"},{"lineNumber":122320,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロナは何度もうんうんと頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rona nodded repeatedly."},{"lineNumber":122321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんで？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why?\""},{"lineNumber":122322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":122323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんで、イアンは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why does Ian...?"},{"lineNumber":122324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　優しくしてくれるの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"treat me so kindly?\""},{"lineNumber":122325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「優しくって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kind...?"},{"lineNumber":122326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...,"},{"lineNumber":122327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう言われると、なんでだろうね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"when you say that, I wonder why...\""},{"lineNumber":122328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":122329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「多分……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe...\""},{"lineNumber":122330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君がとても悲しそうな顔をしていたから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's because you had such a sad look on your face..."},{"lineNumber":122331,"originalJapaneseLine":"　笑顔が見たいなって思った、んだと思う」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think I wanted to see you smile.\""},{"lineNumber":122332,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":122333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「イアンは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ian is..."},{"lineNumber":122334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　優しい、ね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"kind, right?\""},{"lineNumber":122335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなの特別なことじゃないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This isn't something special.\""},{"lineNumber":122336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「笑顔……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Smile...\""},{"lineNumber":122337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":122338,"originalJapaneseLine":"数秒ジッと考えてから、","translatedEnglishLine":"After thinking quietly for a few seconds,"},{"lineNumber":122339,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロナは自分の頬の筋肉を意識的に動かしてみた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rona consciously tried to move the muscles of her cheeks."},{"lineNumber":122340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Like this?\""},{"lineNumber":122341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":122342,"originalJapaneseLine":"「イアン、ありがとう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ian, thank you."},{"lineNumber":122343,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここまででいいよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is enough for now.\""},{"lineNumber":122344,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロナはイアンから荷物を受け取ると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rona took the luggage from Ian,"},{"lineNumber":122345,"originalJapaneseLine":"背を向けてパタパタと行ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"then turned her back and quickly walked away."},{"lineNumber":122346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":122347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああああああっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaaaah...!\""},{"lineNumber":122348,"originalJapaneseLine":"イアンは慌てて口元を手で覆った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ian hurriedly covered his mouth with his hand."},{"lineNumber":122349,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうしなければ、バクバクと高鳴る心臓が、","translatedEnglishLine":"If he didn't, his pounding heart"},{"lineNumber":122350,"originalJapaneseLine":"今にも飛び出してしまいそうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"felt like it would burst out at any moment."},{"lineNumber":122351,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ぼ、僕は何を顔赤くして――！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(W-Why is my face turning red—!)"},{"lineNumber":122352,"originalJapaneseLine":"（いや、これは、そういうことじゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"(No, this isn't that kind of thing,"},{"lineNumber":122353,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、いや、でも、ええっ――！？）","translatedEnglishLine":"n-no, but, eh—!?)"},{"lineNumber":122354,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ぼ、僕ってまさか……","translatedEnglishLine":"(C-Could it be that I..."},{"lineNumber":122355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そ、そうだったの――か！？）","translatedEnglishLine":"i-it's really that way—!?)"},{"lineNumber":122356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、でも、そうすると……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, but then...\""},{"lineNumber":122357,"originalJapaneseLine":"イアンは初めてランスに会った時、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ian recalled the first time he met Lance,"},{"lineNumber":122358,"originalJapaneseLine":"言われたことを思い出していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"remembering what was said to him."},{"lineNumber":122359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、粉骨砕身、身を粉にして働けよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, work yourself to the bone, devote yourself utterly.\""},{"lineNumber":122360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":122361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それと、この城の女に手を出すな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And don't lay a hand on any woman in this castle."},{"lineNumber":122362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もし、出せば命はないものと思え」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you do, know that you'll lose your life.\""},{"lineNumber":122363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いえ、滅相もありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-No, absolutely not."},{"lineNumber":122364,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなことは絶対にしないです、はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I would never do such a thing, yes.\""},{"lineNumber":122365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、それならいいがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, very well then.\""},{"lineNumber":122366,"originalJapaneseLine":"（御主人様は僕にとって大恩あるお方……","translatedEnglishLine":"(My master is someone who has done me great kindness..."},{"lineNumber":122367,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その方との言葉を違えるわけには……）","translatedEnglishLine":"I must not go back on my word to that person...)"},{"lineNumber":122368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……ぼ、僕、僕……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... I, I, I...\""},{"lineNumber":122369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなとこで何してんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you doing in a place like this?\""},{"lineNumber":122370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわわわわぁ〜〜〜〜！？！？！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wahhhhhh!?!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「僕がなんとか、君を守るから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll do whatever I can to protect you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、そんな顔をしないで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, please don't make such a face..."
"As the heir of the Ruston family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度口にした言葉は違えない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never go back on my word once spoken."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今も残ってると思ってるから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I still believe they hold true even now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イアンの言葉をじっくりと咀嚼するように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if carefully digesting Ian's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナは何度もうんうんと頷いた。
そう言われると、なんでだろうね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when you say that, I wonder why..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「君がとても悲しそうな顔をしていたから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's because you had such a sad look on your face...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 笑顔が見たいなって思った、んだと思う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think I wanted to see you smile."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなの特別なことじゃないよ」
数秒ジッと考えてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After thinking quietly for a few seconds,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナは自分の頬の筋肉を意識的に動かしてみた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rona consciously tried to move the muscles of her cheeks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナはイアンから荷物を受け取ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rona took the luggage from Ian,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背を向けてパタパタと行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then turned her back and quickly walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イアンは慌てて口元を手で覆った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ian hurriedly covered his mouth with his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしなければ、バクバクと高鳴る心臓が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If he didn't, his pounding heart

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今にも飛び出してしまいそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: felt like it would burst out at any moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （いや、これは、そういうことじゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No, this isn't that kind of thing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イアンは初めてランスに会った時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ian recalled the first time he met Lance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言われたことを思い出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: remembering what was said to him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、粉骨砕身、身を粉にして働けよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, work yourself to the bone, devote yourself utterly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それと、この城の女に手を出すな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And don't lay a hand on any woman in this castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし、出せば命はないものと思え」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you do, know that you'll lose your life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなことは絶対にしないです、はい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I would never do such a thing, yes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （御主人様は僕にとって大恩あるお方……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (My master is someone who has done me great kindness...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その方との言葉を違えるわけには……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must not go back on my word to that person...)
"What are you doing in a place like this?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
